      • Place

        public Place(java.lang.String _id,
             int _m,
             int _i,
             java.lang.String _name)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a place object mathcing arguments if valid
        Parameters:
        _id - A unique id to identify univoquely the place
        _m - Initial marking
        _i - Index for the petri matrices
        _name - User-defined name. Empty not allowed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if marking is negative or if name is invalid
